root.name: The Adventures of Tintin: Prisoners of the Sun
root.description: The Adventures of Tintin: Prisoners of the Sun is a side-scrolling platforming action game based on two entries in the Herge's (Georges Remi) beloved Belgian comic series: "The Seven Crystal Balls" and "Prisoners of the Sun." Â The player controls intrepid boy-reporter Tintin and must rescue the absnet-minded and hard-of-hearing Prof. Cuthbert Calculus.
